channel.title: Messing around with peoples computers
channel.description:
Well you guys may know this thing but it called "log me in" and it web browser based computer controlling (uses java) Sign up here -- http://logmein.com
2. download and install free version of log-me-in program by clicking "add computer" on the main page when logged in (for firefox you have to install the plugin or you get some cstupid java socket errors...)
3.Make sure you have installed the program on your computer and the other computer (when it asks for email in pass use your login id for website and use the same login email+pass on the other computer suring setup)
4.now that you have downloaded it and installed it on both computers make sure it is enabled on both computers then once you have dont that go to logmein.com and login to your account then click on the name of the computer that you wish to connect to and control and then it will ask a few things which you should be able to figure out
5. once it loaded it will come to a screen which kinda looks like this (this is from my computer an that center part of screen is my other computer you just click stuff to control it you can also control mouse movement) -- [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/145/logmeinlolct0.jpg[/img][/URL]
All you gta do now is click on all there stuff (mouse movement and typing is usable so annoy the hell out of them) Have fun!!
Credits: logmein creators, me for the tutorial
sorry bout rush of this with no punctuation n stuff im in a hurry lol.
Please post feedback :D

item.title: Messing around with peoples computers
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“chipmunk man, post:7, topic:72550”]Sorreh if this counts as bump or sumtin.

But i tried.

I got my friends grounded ftw?[/quote]

Thats great…

But it is a bump… A 28 day bump…

item.title: Messing around with peoples computers
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

or u could just run an old stand alone vnc, mod it so the icon doesnt show up on the task bar, mad simple. better yet go to errmess.com and put the server on ur freinds pc, especialy version 4.1 beta, it can cause masive chaos

Read full topic

item.title: Messing around with peoples computers
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:72550”][quote author=Divine-Devil link=topic=106600.msg1234551#msg1234551 date=1177830774]
Too hard to understand!
[/quote]
Are you serious? It’s simple.[/quote]
This is awesome. I dled this on my friends computer when he wasn’t looking and installed it and did exactly what you just said. He didn’t know, then i went home and did all crazy stuff on it. Such as:

[ul][]Going to porn websites
[]Changing his suer preferences
[*]And a heap more cool stuff.[/ul]

Thanks for the tutorial man.

Read full topic

item.title: Messing around with peoples computers
item.dc:creator: @M4G3OWNS M4G3OWNS
item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

Well you guys may know this thing but it called “log me in” and it web browser based computer controlling
(uses java)
Sign up here – http://logmein.com

  1. download and install free version of log-me-in program by clicking “add computer” on the main page when logged in (for firefox you have to install the plugin or you get some cstupid java socket errors…)

3.Make sure you have installed the program on your computer and the other computer (when it asks for email in pass use your login id for website and use the same login email+pass on the other computer suring setup)

4.now that you have downloaded it and installed it on both computers make sure it is enabled on both computers then once you have dont that go to logmein.com and login to your account then click on the name of the computer that you wish to connect to and control and then it will ask a few things which you should be able to figure out

  1. once it loaded it will come to a screen which kinda looks like this (this is from my computer an that center part of screen is my other computer you just click stuff to control it you can also control mouse movement)
    –

All you gta do now is click on all there stuff (mouse movement and typing is usable so annoy the hell out of them) Have fun!!

Credits: logmein creators, me for the tutorial
